name: SetupmyHR
description: SetupmyHR is a Human Resource Consulting and Outsourcing organization partnering with organizations as their extended HR team. With our specialization in Executive Search, Shared Services Consulting, Leadership Training and Development, Change Management and Setting up or scaling up end-to-end HR practices, we have been able to position ourselves and make a mark in HR Consulting and Executive Search space. SetupmyHR is looking for experienced HR professionals who are ready to explore beyond a full time job. We need strategic HR Practice Partners to work for Start-ups, Small and Medium Enterprises (SME's) and even large organizations in setting up or scaling up their HR practices. These are initiative based project roles and have the flexibility to work part time or full time. We do not offer full time jobs but still a great learning curve through our diversified clients and cross industry exposure
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Your Extended HR Partner
ShortDescription: SetupmyHR is a Human Resource Consulting and Outsourcing organization partnering with organizations as their extended HR team.

Highlights.name: HR FOR STARTUPS, SME'S & OVERSEAS COMPANIES
Highlights.description: This has been particularly designed to provide professionally structured Hiring  and HR Consulting services covering the scope from hiring till retiring for Startups, SME's and overseas companies who are setting up or scaling up their operations

Highlights.name: HR PROJECTS AND INITIATIVES
Highlights.description: Let SetupmyHR partner with you for HR Reengineering initiatives and Projects, HR Digital Transformation, Policies, Processes, M&A Integration, Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) etc while your current HR team continues to focus on core areas

Highlights.name: INTERIM HR LEADERSHIP
Highlights.description: By providing the Interim Leadership expertise on a full-time or part-time basis, we have the capability and expertise to minimize the Strategic and Leadership gaps to enable the HR Function and Employee Experience go to the next level

enhanced_description: SetupmyHR is a Human Resource Consulting and Outsourcing organization that partners with companies as their extended HR team. They specialize in Executive Search, Shared Services Consulting, Leadership Training and Development, and Change Management. The organization focuses on setting up or scaling up end-to-end HR practices, catering to Start-ups, Small and Medium Enterprises (SME's), large organizations, and overseas companies establishing or expanding operations. SetupmyHR offers project-based HR support for initiatives such as HR Reengineering, HR Digital Transformation, Policies and Processes development, M&A Integration, and Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO). Additionally, they provide Interim HR Leadership expertise on a full-time or part-time basis to bridge strategic and leadership gaps, aiming to elevate the HR function and overall employee experience.
key_use_cases: Setting up or scaling up end-to-end HR practices
Providing professionally structured Hiring and HR Consulting services from hiring till retiring
Supporting HR Reengineering initiatives and Projects
Minimizing strategic and leadership gaps through Interim HR Leadership
competitive_advantages: Operates as an extended HR team for clients
Specialization in Executive Search, Shared Services Consulting, Leadership Training & Development, and Change Management

Offers flexible, project-based HR support (part-time or full-time engagement)
Provides Interim HR Leadership expertise to fill strategic and leadership gaps
Offers diverse client and cross-industry exposure (for internal partners, implying broad expertise for clients)
implementation_scenarios: Partnership as an extended HR team
Full-time or part-time interim leadership engagements

Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
